com.viaoa.jfc.control

Class DateChooserController

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.viaoa.hub.HubListenerAdapter
      • com.viaoa.jfc.control.JFCController
        • com.viaoa.jfc.control.DateChooserController
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    HubListener, java.beans.PropertyChangeListener, java.util.EventListener

    public class DateChooserController
extends JFCController
implements java.beans.PropertyChangeListener
    Works directly with OADateChooser for binding an calendar component to an object property.

    For more information about this package, see documentation.

    See Also:
    OADateChooser, OADateComboBox
